meanings.definition: A Middle Eastern salad made with chopped parsley, tomatoes, mint, onion, bulgur, and seasoned with olive oil, lemon juice, and salt.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a refreshing bowl of tabouli at the picnic.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best tabouli for family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The tabouli danced on my taste buds with its zesty flavors.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a bowl of tabouli, bright and full of life.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the tabouli made it irresistible to try.
